info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Accountill using OOPS

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Creator identifier or search term used to filter invoices for counting (from req.query.searchQuery).

200.description: Successful response returning the total count of invoices for the given creator (searchQuery).

404.description: Error retrieving the total count; returns an object with an error message.

200.description: Successful response - returns the invoice object

404.description: No invoice with that id (returned when the provided id is not a valid MongoDB ObjectId)

requestBody.description: Invoice object with fields to update

200.description: Successful retrieval of paginated clients list

404.description: Clients not found or error occurred

200.description: Successful signin - returns the authenticated user, their profile (if any), and an auth token.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: User identifier used to find a profile by its userId (mapped to req.query.searchQuery).

404.description: Profile already exists (controller uses 404 in this case)

409.description: Conflict or other error occurred while creating the profile

200.description: Successful signup. Returns created user (result), an associated userProfile (if any), and an authentication token.

400.description: Bad Request — either the user already exists or the provided passwords do not match.

500.description: Internal Server Error — an unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

requestBody.description: Request body containing the email address for password reset

200.description: Password reset request processed successfully; an email has been sent if the account exists.

422.description: User with the provided email does not exist in the database.

requestBody.description: Payload containing the new password and the reset token sent to the user's email

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the profile to retrieve

404.description: Not found or error - returns an error message
No profile with the given id (invalid or not found).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Profile id (MongoDB ObjectId) to identify the profile to update

requestBody.description: Profile object with fields to update. Partial updates are supported.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Filter invoices by creator. Provide the creator identifier (e.g. user id or username) as a query string value.

200.description: Successful response returning an array of invoice documents in the 'data' property.

404.description: Invoices not found or an error occurred while fetching invoices.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: User id to filter clients by (passed to the DB query as userId).

200.description: Successful response - list of clients for the given user

404.description: Not Found - error while fetching clients

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the client to delete

404.description: No Client with that id (invalid id)

requestBody.description: Client object with fields to update

200.description: Successful update: returns the updated client object

404.description: Invalid client id: returns a plain text error message

_id.description: MongoDB generated identifier for the user

expireToken.description: Expiry date/time of the reset token (if set)

userId.description: Array of user id strings as stored in the profile

inline_response_200_5_userProfile.description: Profile document associated with the user, if any. May be absent/null in some cases.

message.description: Generic error message, e.g. 'Something went wrong'
Human-readable error message, e.g. 'User already exist' or 'Password don't match'

error.example: User does not exist in our database

token.description: JWT token issued for the newly created user

password.description: The new password to set for the user

token.description: The password reset token previously emailed to the user

_id.description: Unique identifier generated by the database (ObjectId as string)

logo.description: URL or identifier for the logo

userId.description: Identifier of the user who owns this profile

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the profile was created
